message.content: {"id": "18705", "title": "Too much flashing in Control Example", "description": "When running the Control example and resizing the window only in the vertical direction, it can be observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash. This behavior occurs because the entire content of the frames is being repainted. ", "OB": "When resizing the window in the vertical direction, only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, rather than the entire content of the frames.", "EB": "Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames needs to be repainted. This will reduce the flashing issue and improve the performance of the control example.", "SR": "Update the repaint behavior of the Control Example to only repaint the bottom edge of the outermost frames when resizing the window in the vertical direction."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
